function.name: GetFirstPersonObserverOffset
function.desc: Returns whether first-person is enabled for this entity, as well as the first-person observer offset (if first-person is enabled).

function.name: SetFirstPersonObserverOffset
function.desc: Changes the entity's first-person observer offset.

function.name: GetFirstPersonModeEnabledProperty
function.desc: Returns the component's first-person enabled property.

function.name: GetFirstPersonObserverOffsetProperty
function.desc: Returns the component's first-person observer offset property.

function.name: GetThirdPersonObserverOffset
function.desc: Returns whether third-person is enabled for this entity, as well as the third-person observer offset (if third-person is enabled).

function.name: SetThirdPersonObserverOffset
function.desc: Changes the entity's third-person observer offset.

function.name: GetThirdPersonModeEnabledProperty
function.desc: Returns the component's third-person enabled property.

function.name: GetThirdPersonObserverOffsetProperty
function.desc: Returns the component's third-person observer offset property.

function.name: SetObserverOffset
function.desc: Changes both the entity's first-person and third-person offsets to the specified value.

function.name: ResetObserverOffset
function.desc: Resets both the entity's first-person and third-person offsets.
